name: Beaked The Cultist
description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character. 

Recent Changes (0.5.5):
- Mending Plumage art cleaned up. (Ashe)
- Sacred Necklace and Shiny Bauble art (Midn8)
- 2 new Beaked costumes (Ashe, Kiooeht)
- 2 new relics, 1 Boss and 1 Shop tier (Reina)
- Sacred Necklace is now Super Rare.
- Inspiration now Exhausts, then draws.
- Giant Parasite now gains armor every turn.
- Face Trader event now always gives Cultist Mask.
- Flawless Sticks triggers earlier pre-battle.
- Other relics given proper placeholder art.
- Updated credits.

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!
